commit.message:
add finalized storage for stateRoot to slot for missed slots

 - add test to show retrieval of a finalized state by state root

fixes #2184

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

nodes.bodyText: We should log a WARN level message in this case.

I think this winds up recording the state root for the slot of the last block rather than starting at the slot after that block.  It will get the stateRoot right for that slot, it's just needlessly performing two database writes.
Rather than having
updater.addFinalizedStateRoot(state.hash_tree_root(), state.getSlot());

in RocksDbDatabase, I'd be tempted to move it here after the while loop exits and then increment slot so that when acceptNextState returns slot == state.getSlot() + 1.  That way this class is responsible for recording all the state roots and we avoid double recording the state root when a block is present.
